New Records: LaMelo Ball is on pace to shatter the record set by Russell Westbrook in the 2016-17 season for most points per game in the fourth quarter
Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball scored 17 points in the fourth quarter to help the Hornets secure a 103-83 win over the Pacers
Others: Brandon Miller scored 17 points in the third quarter to help the Hornets come back from a 64-51 deficit
